bug.author: AlexDBlack
bug.description:
Looks like we have some new CNN3D gradient check failures. These weren't failing last I checked about a week ago. All tests for CNN3DGradientCheckTest - <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/blob/master/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j-core/src/test/java/org/deeplearning4j/gradientcheck/CNN3DGradientCheckTest.java>https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/blob/master/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j-core/src/test/java/org/deeplearning4j/gradientcheck/CNN3DGradientCheckTest.java</denchmark-link>
Edit: testSeparableConv2D too. Tests run on Windows, native backend. Aha! Link: <denchmark-link:https://skymindai.aha.io/features/ND4J-24>https://skymindai.aha.io/features/ND4J-24</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
